item.description:
International Limoncello Day is February 20th....

This day has not existed previously, but is a new holiday created by Noelle and Flavia. 

 

This day may truly become an International holiday after all..... at least to Italophiles worldwide. Limoncello is a famous Italian liquor made from fresh Lemons.  What a great reason to get together to celebrate. 

Papa Razzi, Sunday, February 20th, 2011 at 5:00pm

Let's get together to shake off the winter blues, and celebrate something warm and summery.....  We'll meet in the bar area for some drinks and appetizers.... and of course toast this special day with some delicious Limoncello

* This is a joint event with the Eastern Mass Italian Language and Culture Group

International Limoncello Day information:

If you have a facebook profile, you can go to the link below for more information, and click the "Like" button. Help us spread the word, by sharing this link with your friends.

Grazie a Tutti!!

http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#!/pages/International-Limoncello-Day-February-20th/186036594762489
